title: Vance says antisemitism isn't exploding on the right
description: Vice President JD Vance, reflecting Thursday on his first year in office, said that he disagrees with fellow Republicans who have warned of a rise in antisemitism in their party.“Judging anybody based on their skin color or immutable characteristics, I think,…
content:
